A Public Apology
============

![](https://www.incimages.com/uploaded_files/image/1920x1080/getty_484825782_351130.jpg)

Everyone makes mistakes and unfortunately I'm not immune to them. A non-exhaustive list of some past mistakes includes the following: 

 1. Not washing my shower curtain for a year.
 2. Unwittingly kicking my laptop off the bed. 
 3. Eating packets of sugar for breakfast.

However, the relevant mistake here is my procrastination in completing my planned blogs. If you're reading this, it means I've failed to put 
up my posts in time. 

For that, I proffer a sincere, heartfelt apology. Hopefully I'll take this down soon enough.
